message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.NI, cs.MM

The paper deals with the design of optimal power allocation strategies for remote estimation using an energy harvesting sensor. This involves the use of communication and signal processing techniques, which are typically covered in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the optimization of mean-square error, which is a common objective in the Machine Learning (cs.MA) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper includes numerical evaluations, which may involve the use of multimedia techniques, making the Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category a possibility as well.
